sentences.en: Availability: The color is uneven, flesh and so on dark pouches, pockmark.
sentences.cn: 适用肌肤: 肤色不均 、 黑眼圈 、 痘疤等肌肤.

sentences.en: She has a poor complexion and pockmarks on her forehead.
sentences.cn: 她面色不佳，额头上有一些麻子。

sentences.en: Small bodies of water pockmark the flat face of the area.
sentences.cn: 那地区平坦的地面上坑坑洼洼地布满了小水潭.

words.tran_cn: 使有痘痕；使有凹痕（pockmark的过去式）

trans.tran_en: a hollow mark on someone’s skin or on the surface of something
